action_list.description: System action for installing an application

attrs.script:
#yum update -y
systemctl disable firewalld
setenforce 0
curl --silent --location https://rpm.nodesource.com/setup_10.x | sudo bash -
yum install nodejs git wget unzip -y
yum update -y nss curl libcurl
git clone https://github.com/atryputsen/node-multiplayer-snake.git
cd node-multiplayer-snake
npm install jspm -g


wget https://bin.equinox.io/c/4VmDzA7iaHb/ngrok-stable-linux-amd64.zip
unzip ngrok-stable-linux-amd64.zip


#npm install ngrok -g
npm install
jspm install
npm run bundle

npm start &
./ngrok http 3000

action_list.name: action_install
